tool_description:
Sentiment Dynamics is a powerful domain-independent API for Sentiment Analysis and Opinion Mining.

Simple and effective tool for opinion polarity classification. You can determine if a text has a positive, negative or neutral opinion polarity.

Our API enables you the posibility of extract the keywords that represent the opinion targets.
name: Sentiment Dynamics
title: Sentiment Dynamics

api_list.name: Query
api_list.description: Polarity Classification and Opinion Target Extraction

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: "I love the new face recognition featur of my new phone"

optional_parameters.name: aspects
optional_parameters.description: Indicates if opinion target extraction is performed

optional_parameters.name: normalize
optional_parameters.description: Indicates if text normalization is performed
